name: py-reportlab
description:
The ReportLab Toolkit. An Open Source Python library for generating PDFs
and graphics.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: pil
dependencies.description:
Pillow is a fork of the Python Imaging Library (PIL). It adds image
processing capabilities to your Python interpreter. This library
supports many file formats, and provides powerful image processing and
graphics capabilities.

dependencies.name: freetype
dependencies.description:
FreeType is a freely available software library to render fonts. It is
written in C, designed to be small, efficient, highly customizable, and
portable while capable of producing high-quality output (glyph images)
of most vector and bitmap font formats.

dependent_to.name: py-cnvkit
dependent_to.description: Copy number variation toolkit for high-throughput sequencing.

dependent_to.name: py-rst2pdf
dependent_to.description:
Convert reStructured Text to PDF via ReportLab. The usual way of
creating PDF from reStructuredText is by going through LaTeX. This tool
provides an alternative by producing PDF directly using the ReportLab
library.
